name: json-to-csv-in-browser
description: This converts the json array in the browser to csv file that can be stored in disc

scripts.dev: tsc -p . && cd lib && browserify index.js -o bundle.js && cd ../ && yalc publish && cd test && yalc update json-to-csv-in-browser && browserify client.js -o bundle.js

author: Dr Umesh R Bilagi
